column1: Alalminórë was a region in the centre of the island of Tol Eressëa
column2: being its fairest realm. The city of Kortirion was situated in Alalminórë.

column1: In Qenya Alalminórë is glossed "Land of Elms"
column3: p. 5 which the Gnomes also call Gar Lossion

column1: Christopher Tolkien identifies the Land of Elms as Wikipedia:Warwickshire.
